bioAsHtml: Luigi started his "career" as a developer a 8 on a Commodore 64. After studying Computer Engineering, he had a 10 years career in software development and ICT consulting, mainly focused on OpenSource. Now he is Director of Consulting at Orient Technologies and one of the main core developers of OrientDB
bio:
Luigi started his "career" as a developer a 8 on a Commodore 64. 
After studying Computer Engineering, he had a 10 years career in software development and ICT consulting, mainly focused on OpenSource.
Now he is Director of Consulting at Orient Technologies and one of the main core developers of OrientDB
